import React from 'react' function Sort() { const [open, setOpen] = React.useState(false) const [selected, setSelected] = React.useState(0) const list= ['популярности','цене','алфавиту'] const onClickSelect = (i)=>{ setSelected(i) setOpen(false) } return (
Сортировка по: setOpen(!open)}>{list[selected]}
{ open && (
    {list.map((name, i)=>
  • onClickSelect(i)} key={i} className={selected === i ? 'active' : ''}>{name}
    • )}
)}
) } export default Sort
